summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.24.050, 23.34.007, 23.34.008, 23.42.106, 23.44.012, 23.45.009, 23.47.004, 23.47.012, 23.47.014, 23.47.016, 23.47.042, 23.50.026, 23.54.015, 23.55.020, 23.61.008, and 23.76.036 of Title 23, Land Use Code, of the Seattle Municipal Code, to clarify regulations, correct minor omissions, and ensure clarity and consistency among regulatory provisions governing development.
